alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 3:25PM CDT until June 09 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RICE AND SOUTHERN ELLSWORTH COUNTIES... At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Geneseo, or 10 miles north of Lyons, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Geneseo, Lorraine, Frederick, Kanopolis Lake and Kanopolis State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
